pinyin: guo2 ji4 huo4 yun4 dai4 li3
Jie2 da2 Hang2 kong1 Huo4 yun4

sentences.english: During the depression, I used to hop freights at least once a month.
sentences.chinese: 大蕭條時期，我一月至少一次要偷偷搭乘貨運列車。

sentences.english: Hong Kong Air Cargo Terminals Limited is one of the leading air cargo terminal operators in the world.
sentences.chinese: 香港空運貨站是世界領先的航空貨運站之一。

sentences.english: The third chapter gives the development trend and characteristics of international air cargo market.
sentences.chinese: 第三章大概分析了國際貨運市場的發展趨勢及特點。

sentences.english: Also, what CFS (Consolidated Freight Station) do you use in New York?
sentences.chinese: 並告，你們在紐約用的是哪個集裝箱貨運站？

sentences.english: China is building a high-speed freight rail line all the way to Hamburg Germany.
sentences.chinese: 中國正在建設一條高速貨運鐵路線，直達德國漢堡。

sentences.english: With the formation of industrial clusters, inland cities will be encouraged to open international passenger and cargo air routes, and develop multimodal transportation.
sentences.chinese: 支持內陸城市增開國際客貨運航線，發展多式聯運。

sentences.english: China moves more than 10 times as much freight per kilometer of its train routes than the global average.
sentences.chinese: 中國鐵路每公里貨運量是世界平均值的十倍。
一列貨運列車隆隆地駛過。

sentences.english: About us Established in Qingdao, China in 2003 Empire-Sky Logistics Co.
sentences.chinese: 舜天航國際貨運代理有限公司2003年始創於青島。

sentences.english: Air cargo has continued to decline, a further demonstration of the global economic downturn.
sentences.chinese: 航空貨運量也仍舊下跌，進一步顯示全球經濟低迷。

sentences.english: Two more direct cross-Strait cargo routes will also be added.
sentences.chinese: 兩岸間還將增開兩條直航貨運線路。

sentences.english: It also runs Chiltern Railways and rail freight services in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 它也經營着奇爾頓鐵路公司和英國的貨運代理服務。

sentences.english: A straight-through layout flow is best for manufacturing or freight forwarding operations.
sentences.chinese: 直通式佈局流是最好的製造或貨運業務。

sentences.english: Cluster analysis, Market segmentation, Air cargo.
sentences.chinese: 集羣分析，市場區隔，航空貨運。

sentences.english: This road will bring air cargo customs clearance more convenient.
sentences.chinese: 這條道路將爲航空貨運的通關帶來更大便利。

sentences.english: Do you have a CFS in your container terminal?
sentences.chinese: 你們集裝箱碼頭有貨運站嗎？

definition: running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
